goals.complete: I met with Mehid and Salia outside the hunting lodge, and we broke open the cult. Apparently, the White Mantle is hiding behind bandit activities. They incite the impoverished citizens of Kryta, and use them to act against the Queen's servants.

goals.active: Inform Logan Thackeray of the White Mantle hit list.
goals.complete: I returned to Captain Thackeray and showed him the list. He was very concerned, and we created a plan of attack against these bandits and their cult.
